column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The concerned townsdwarf is wrestling with her worries.
Speak with the sulking townsdwarf.
/cheer up the sulking townsdwarf.
Speak with the concerned townsdwarf.
I hope she'll be all right...
Oh, lali-ho! Sorry, I was off in my own little world there...
I just can't shake the sight of it─my best friend, meeting in secret with one of them filthy, no-good Goggs. If the others were to hear about this, her honor would be forfeit!

So can you believe I saw her heading out into Scree─alone─not a few moments ago? At least she had the decency to hang her head in shame. Please, stranger, I need you to convince her to stop this madness while I keep the chief's attention elsewhere.
...Come back to the village? No, I bloody well will not! I need to be alone. Have you never felt the pain of heartbreak!?
Argh! I m-mean... Just go away!
...Bah, I might as well tell you now, eh? I was in love with a Gogg.

It all began the day a cliffkite attacked me as I was coming home from the mines. <Emphasis>He</Emphasis> saved me from becoming its dinner. He was strapping and sweet, and so I learned his patrol route. Brought him iguana tails, talked about sediment─you know, the usual stuff.
Then, once we'd gotten to know each other, I confessed my feelings. But he refused me, saying he could never court a Tholl. Said it was impossible...

<sniff> I almost wish he'd left me for the cliffkite... But he's probably right. Who in Tomra would recognize our love? Who is there to <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>cheer<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> me on?
<sniff> Won't anyone <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>cheer<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> for our love...?
...Thank you. There'll be few enough kind words for me if news gets out. But I won't give up! I'll think of a way for my Gogg and I to be together!
I see you got my friend to come back, but she was in too much of a hurry to spare me a second glance. What happened out there?
What will you do?
Explain the situation.
Keep your mouth shut.
She fell in <Emphasis>love</Emphasis> with him!? With a Gogg? Ugh, the chief can never know about this...
Not your place to say, eh? Well, I was meaning to talk to her about this anyway...
Thank you for your help, stranger. I'll do my best to keep her out of trouble!
